last_episode_to_air.name: Thursday, May 17, 2018
last_episode_to_air.overview: A Russian face slap champion is crowned. A racist lawyer erupts at people speaking Spanish. A Kent State grad loves her guns. Terry Crews talks Brooklyn 99 & Deadpool 2.

name: Desus & Mero
overview: The Bronx's very own Desus Nice and The Kid Mero, aka the Bodega Boys, give you their takes on politics, sports, entertainment and other subjects they don't really know about. The brand is strong!  Watch this because Mero has mad kids and Desus loves sneakers and they’re funny and the other late night shows are corny AF.

episodes.name: Monday, October 17, 2016
episodes.overview: In the late night premiere, the guys dive into discussing the "rigged" election. Later comedian/rapper Awkwafina stops by the studio.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 18, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus and Mero discuss Mary J Blige's divorce proceedings, Al Green's painful anniversary and shout out conspiracy theorists everywhere.

episodes.name: Wednesday, October 19, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus and Mero don't talk about the debate but they do talk about a smoking North Korean chimp. DJ Vashtie Kola stops by.

episodes.name: Thursday, October 20, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero recap the debate lowlights, breakdown Kanye's latest rant and Charlamagne Tha God stops by to watch a clip of the first ever hate crime during a game of cornhole.

episodes.name: Monday, October 24, 2016
episodes.overview: Lighting some people up.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 25, 2016
episodes.overview: Put on your sunglasses because this episode is super lit.

episodes.name: Wednesday, October 26, 2016
episodes.overview: This episode is on fire.

episodes.name: Thursday, October 27, 2016
episodes.overview: This episode isn't just TV, it's art.

episodes.name: Monday, October 31, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero welcome Anthony Weiner back into the headlines and shout out the world's largest pit bull. Jillionaire stops by to question the need for Halloween.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 1, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero judge Lebron's Halloween party and Jay and Bey's costumes. But the scariest part of last night was Tump leading the polls by one point.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 2, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero beg their fans to stop tweeting that the Knicks suck. Rembert Browne stops by to reminisce about his flight on Air Force 1.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 3, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss the World Champion Chicago Cubs' disgusting dugout celebration, Kenny Chesney's disgusting snub of Beyonce and Johnny Damon's disgusting support of Trump.

episodes.name: Monday, November 7, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero endorse Jay Z's endorsement of Hillary and Putin's love of bears. Former White House Deputy Chief of Staff Alyssa Mastromonaco stops by to talk about what life with Barry is like.

episodes.name: Live Election Special 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero usher in the end of our national nightmare live! With special in-studio guests Talib Kweli, Cardi B and Jim Jones. Plus political commentary from Joe Budden, Ezra Koenig, Charlamagne Tha God and The Fat Jew.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 9, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero nurse their election hangover by continuing to talk about the election. DeRay McKesson stops by to talk election aftermath and his activism.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 10, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero talk the awkward Trump/Obama meet and greet, the awful Paul McCartney Mannequin Challenge and Mero's wife surprises him with a phone call.

episodes.name: Monday, November 14, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero welcome white nationalism to the White House and listen to Yoko Ono's screaming tribute to President-elect Trump. Bomani Jones stops by to discuss The Root 100 list.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 15, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Barry's dig on Hillary and New Balance's unwanted endorsement deal. Nick Catchdubs stops by to talk about 50 Cents' rainmaking skills.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 16, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero look forward to Trump's reality show presidency. Adult film star Janice Griffin stops by to talk racism in porn and adult stocking stuffers.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 17, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Drake's staged crush. Cord Jefferson stops by to play a game of where in the world was Cord Jefferson.

episodes.name: Monday, November 21, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero break down Kanye's breakdown and shout out yoga goats. NY Times Food editor Sam Sifton stops by to talk about chopped cheese appropriations.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 22, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero salute the alt-right for not being as bad as actual Nazis and impersonate DMX. Special guest Rashida Jones stops by to show us her monkey bite scar.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 23, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero prepare for Thanksgiving with blogger @KFC from Barstool Sports.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 24, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero celebrate Thanksgiving by giving thanks for their favorite moments from past episodes of Desus & Mero.

episodes.name: Monday, November 28, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Colin Kaepernick's foray into controversial t-shirt wearing. Artist Tony Peralta stops by to talk Washington Heights gentrification.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 29, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero say some problematic $#!%. Columnist Michael Arceneaux joins them.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 30, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss what Mitt Romney ate besides his pride during dinner with Donald Trump. Chris Hayes stops by to talk growing up in the Bronx.

episodes.name: Thursday, December 1, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Melo's last second shot and Obama's last minute weed endorsement. Model Amina Blue stops by to talk about music video life.

episodes.name: Monday, December 5, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero congratulate Ben Carson for getting the job he said he's unqualified for. Ebony editor Jamilah Lemieux discusses misconceptions about black activist groups.

episodes.name: Tuesday, December 6, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero take credit for Klay Thompson's 60 point explosion. Knicks Superfan The Loopy Blogger stops by to talk about who he has beefs with and why he's a Dallas Cowboys fan.

episodes.name: Wednesday, December 7, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero make plans to spend Mother's Day with Derek Jeter. Legendary hip hop group The Lox stop by to talk about coming up and staying there.

episodes.name: Thursday, December 8, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus watches Mero destroy the Apple Crush challenge. ESPN's Pablo Torre stops by to name drop Mark Zuckerberg's wife and to teach us the New York way to kill a mouse.

episodes.name: Monday, December 12, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero join Trump in questioning his intelligence. Immortal Technique sits down to talk about that time he made Lin-Manuel Miranda sing in a garbage can.

episodes.name: Tuesday, December 13, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Kanye's strangest move to date: meeting with Trump. Nick Cannon stops by to dish on why he wasn't invited to his kids' playdate with Beyonce.

episodes.name: Wednesday, December 14, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus and Mero debate whether or not you should mouth kiss your kids. Willie Geist stops by to talk about interviewing Mick Jagger.

episodes.name: Thursday, December 15, 2016
episodes.overview: Mero pleads with Chrissy Teigen to follow him on Twitter again while Desus loses his shit. Comedian Franchesca Ramsey tells us why you should never make white girls cry.

episodes.name: Monday, December 19, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus compliments Mero for his "butt expertise." Garbage Time's Katie Nolan stops by to audition for the newly open position in Fifth Harmony.

episodes.name: Tuesday, December 20, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero shoutout the security guard who was way too excited to see the San Diego Chargers Cheerleaders. John Hodgman sits down to talk about the time he kinda wished he and his wife had gotten hit by a car and to throw some shade at the Verizon guy.

episodes.name: Wednesday, December 21, 2016
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero watch videos that make them never want to book Delta flights to Kentucky. Angie Martinez stops by to try her best to make the guys cry.

episodes.name: Thursday, December 22, 2016
episodes.overview: On their last show of 2016, Desus & Mero celebrate the holidays by braving the cold and bros of Santacon.

episodes.name: Monday, January 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero kick off the new year by watching a video of a guy not getting shot for calling a cop a dickhead. Abdullah Saeed stops by to teach the guys how to smoke weed out of a bear's ass.

episodes.name: Tuesday, January 10, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus reminds Mero that Sessions is the guy who sees no value in Dominican immigrants. Josh Brown stops by to give some money tips and clarify he's not THAT Josh Brown.

episodes.name: Wednesday, January 11, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Barry's powerful farewell speech and the accuracy of Trump's golden leak. NY Times Critic Wesley Morris stops by to talk about the one door his pulitzer prize has yet to open for him.

episodes.name: Thursday, January 12, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero cancel their L.L. Bean catalog subscription and mourn a robot monkey's death. Writer Jenna Wortham talks about the time she turned down an offer from NYT.

episodes.name: Monday, January 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero celebrate MLK day with recording artist Jean Grea.

episodes.name: Tuesday, January 17, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus somehow gets Mero REALLY fired up about Ray Romano. Comedian Neal Brennan talks about his Netflix special, public bathrooms and "The Pullout Gang."

episodes.name: Wednesday, January 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero debate Nelly vs Drake but agree there's definitely a Trump pee tape. Melissa Harris-Perry discusses tampon earrings and the time she saw Obama at Walgreens.

episodes.name: Thursday, January 19, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus asks UFC's Amanda Nunes to give Mero some tips for kicking Ray Romano's ass. Jamali Maddix talks about meeting racists and the calming effect of saying "White Devil."

episodes.name: Monday, January 23, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero share some alternative facts and play a game of "Fuck Up a Nazi." "Another Round" podcast hosts Heben and Tracy talk women's march and b-hole bleaching.

episodes.name: Tuesday, January 24, 2017
episodes.overview: Soledad O'Brien pleads with the media to stop normalizing white supremacy. Desus & Mero plead with their male viewers to get tested for HPV.

episodes.name: Wednesday, January 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero watch Sean Spicer stutter through a press conference and Kellyanne bomb at standup. Joe Budden talks Trump's wall and invites the guys to his pool party.

episodes.name: Thursday, January 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Donald Trump is still talking about the size of his inauguration crowd and Sean Spicer is still tweeting with his butt cheeks. Stevie J tells a Biggie story for the ages.

episodes.name: Monday, January 30, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Trump's fears of Muslims and staircases. CC Sabathia talks about throwing 147 pitches in a game and eating two boxes of Cap'n Crunch in one sitting.

episodes.name: Tuesday, January 31, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero watch a group of Chimps eat their dead leader's genitals.  Former Black Panther Jamal Joseph talks about his transformative moment in prison, his memoir and his new film, "Chapter & Verse."

episodes.name: Wednesday, February 1, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero dive into Donald Trump's Black History Month "listening session", wonder what Obama's vacation is looking like, and examine Drake's appearance on Nicki Minaj's Instagram.

episodes.name: Thursday, February 2, 2017
episodes.overview: Beyonce is having twins, Donald is praying for Arnold and Desus & Mero are fighting a Ray Romano pillow. Jemele Hill talks sports, politics, and Beyonce's twins.

episodes.name: Monday, February 6, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero recap the Super Bowl & blame the Russians for the Patriots' win. Fat Joe talks about his love of the Bronx & how giant birds made him sell his dream house.

episodes.name: Tuesday, February 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero check out Barry's vacay pics and watch a cockroach get removed from a girl's skull. BMX rider Nigel Sylvester does the first and last bike trick on set.

episodes.name: Wednesday, February 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero show us what Mitch McConnell and George Lopez have in common.  Hot 97's Nessa joins the debate on mouth kissing your kids and talks vegan farts.

episodes.name: Thursday, February 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero trash Ivanka Trump's shoes, freestyle rap Coretta Scott King's name and pay Charles Oakley the respects that the Knicks refuse to.

episodes.name: Monday, February 13, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero compares Adele's Grammy speech to a typical ending of a Knicks game. Yandy Smith recalls working for Jim Jones when "Ballin" dropped.

episodes.name: Tuesday, February 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero spend Valentine's Day talking about Trump & Flynn's breakup, Ivanka's Trudeau crush and gorilla sex. Mr. Vegas proves he can still hit the high notes.

episodes.name: Wednesday, February 15, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero read angry Trump tweets and a sad Future Instagram. Rachel Maddow discusses how fiction is a better source than history in contextualizing today's news.

episodes.name: Thursday, February 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero get just as confused as you did by Donald Trump's bizarre press conference. David East tells us why he was afraid to drive Kevin Durant's Maybach.

episodes.name: Monday, February 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero recap the Oscars and breakdown Remy Ma's latest dis on Nicki Manaj. Activist Johnetta Elzie talks about getting tear gassed in Ferguson and Campaign Zero.

episodes.name: Tuesday, February 28, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero tell Kellyanne to get her damn feet off the damn couch. Comedian Damien Lemon tells us how to handle hecklers.

episodes.name: Wednesday, March 1, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero breakdown Trump's joint session in DC and Sessions' threat to joints everywhere. Don Q warns that his crew might steal your girl at his show.

episodes.name: Thursday, March 2, 2017
episodes.overview: Jeff Sessions gets exposed for being the liar Desus & Mero have been telling you he is. Flatbush Zombies talk about guilty purchases and psychedelics.

episodes.name: Monday, March 6, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss the pros but mostly the cons of the 'smart condom.' Eddie Huang tells his Mongolian airport bathroom disaster story.

episodes.name: Tuesday, March 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Ben Carson redefines slavery, Trump literally stands in Hill's shadow and Mero juggles fruit for Desus. Ebro stops by to discuss his role in the Nicki/Remy beef.

episodes.name: Wednesday, March 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero play some of Donald Trump's greatest hits on women. Crissle West tells us how she plans to celebrate International Women's Day.

episodes.name: Thursday, March 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero celebrate the union of Bronx royalty J-Lo & A-Rod. Joey Bada$$ discusses acting, music and what the secret service asked him not to do.

episodes.name: Monday, March 13, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero remind Congressman Steve King that Iowa was not part of the confederacy. Faith Evans discusses her new album and Biggie's legacy.

episodes.name: Tuesday, March 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Breitbart and the CBO snitch on Paul Ryan and Sam Jackson tells black British actors to Get Out. Guest Michael Arceneaux is on team Nicki and dreams of being gay Future.

episodes.name: Wednesday, March 15, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero breakdown the Maddow letdown and the greatest Bronx video ever. NFL player Jared Odrick talks locker room fights and Toradol Tuesdays.

episodes.name: Thursday, March 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump is 0 for 2 on racist travel bans but batting .1000 in "Lock Her Up" chants at rallies. Jesse Williams talks ebrojis, his favorite job and not being an actual Dr.

episodes.name: Monday, March 20, 2017
episodes.overview: Drake drops his new album, Comey testifies and Desus & Mero remind the world that Tim Allen's a snitch. Chris Hayes talks about his new book and Trump's tweets.

episodes.name: Tuesday, March 21, 2017
episodes.overview: In a strange twist, Desus & Mero talk Trump's golfing and Tiger Woods' hair. VICE World of Sports host Sal Masekela recalls getting high with Method Man and DMX.

episodes.name: Wednesday, March 22, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero pay tribute to twitter comic Mike Huckabee and classic NBA fights. Young M.A talks about her drunken Jamaican show and the online obsession with her strap.

episodes.name: Thursday, March 23, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero imagine what it would be like to party with Trump in Russia. Michael Skolnik recalls the time Trump told him he'd run for president in 2012.

episodes.name: Monday, March 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump helps Desus & Mero discover their new least favorite Fox News host. Mike Will Made-It recalls the time Chief Keef hung up on him.

episodes.name: Tuesday, March 28, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero tell Rachel Dolezal and Bill O'Reilly to stay out of black peoples' hair. Run The Jewels talk about the moment they knew their solo days were done.

episodes.name: Wednesday, March 29, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero tell Maxine Waters and April Ryan they got their backs. Arian Foster discusses his retirement from the NFL and fighting wolves to the death.

episodes.name: Thursday, March 30, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero theorize why Mike Pence really calls his wife "Mother." Juelz Santana recalls waking up Cam'ron to meet him and bar fighting with Jim Jones.

episodes.name: Monday, April 3, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero discuss Bill O'Reilly's harassment suits, thank Jerry Jones for finally being pro-weed and watch a video of a grandma literally getting shit-faced.

episodes.name: Tuesday, April 4, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump voters worry they'll end up on the wrong side of the wall they voted for. Hari Kondabolu recalls interning for Hillary Clinton and saying no to Chris Rock.

episodes.name: Wednesday, April 5, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero help Pepsi understand what they got wrong in their new ad. Guest Angela Rye addresses her epic beatdown on Joe Walsh.

episodes.name: Thursday, April 6, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump changes his tune on Syria and Maxine Waters wants O'Reilly in jail. Guest Mack Wilds talks about his new album and how he got on Adele's video for "Hello."

episodes.name: Monday, April 17, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero travel to LA for Weed Week! Jerrod Carmichael talks about his idea for a new Titanic movie, meeting Petey Pablo & having no fond memories of being poor.

episodes.name: Tuesday, April 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Lala makes Melo a free agent and Trump casually hopes to avoid nuclear war. Anthony Anderson talks about going back to college and why he had to hire his mother.

episodes.name: Wednesday, April 19, 2017
episodes.overview: The Patriots meet Trump without Brady & O'Reilly meets the Pope without a job. Aubrey Plaza stops by to FaceTime Chelsea Peretti for baby gift ideas.

episodes.name: Thursday, April 20, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero celebrate 420 by debating who the hottest white male celebrity is. Shane Smith talks about his Picasso plate and being banned from North Korea.

episodes.name: Monday, April 24, 2017
episodes.overview: Obama speaks to Chicago youth about leadership while our nation's leader sends a flurry of angry tweets from his toilet. A$AP Ferg talks fashion & Timb etiquette.

episodes.name: Tuesday, April 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Shea Moisture and FaceApp compete to see which company can offend the most people of color. Jay Williams tells us why he would never gamble with Michael Jordan.

episodes.name: Wednesday, April 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Fox News is an equal opportunity discriminator & their boy Jesse Watters defends Ivanka by making a dick joke. Rick Ross talks healthy eating & makes it rain watermelons.

episodes.name: Thursday, April 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump releases his tax plan on what appears to be a dinner napkin. Chad Johnson talks about his FIFA soccer dominance and encourages Desus to make a baby.

episodes.name: Monday, May 1, 2017
episodes.overview: Fyre Festival was neither fire nor festive & Trump thinks the Civil War was just a big misunderstanding. Neil deGrasse Tyson discusses his new book & movie plot holes.

episodes.name: Tuesday, May 2, 2017
episodes.overview: It's racist bobblehead night at Fenway while Lala shades Melo at the Met Gala. The Lucas Bros. discuss their Netflix special and their Jermaine Jackson obsession.

episodes.name: Wednesday, May 3, 2017
episodes.overview: Hillary emerges with some tweet inducing shade for Trump while Jeter & A-Rod bond during a terrible interview. Paul Scheer gives the guys shit for shopping at Erewhon.

episodes.name: Thursday, May 4, 2017
episodes.overview: To celebrate the 100th episode of Desus & Mero, Morning Joe and Mika get engaged and Tom Colicchio joins the guys for a Chopped Cheese taste test.

episodes.name: Monday, May 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Charles Barkley tries to end racism with a TV show while a racist Trader Joe's shopper earns her 15 minutes the hard way. Krishna Andavolu talks about driving stoned.

episodes.name: Tuesday, May 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Sally Yates fact slaps Ted Cruz and Spirit takes bad airline PR to the next level. Shad Moss recalls the time Michael Jordan threw out his sneakers.

episodes.name: Wednesday, May 10, 2017
episodes.overview: Comey gets fired by Trump and Bow Bow gets busted by the internet. Timothy Simons discusses how it sometimes feel like team Trump is parodying Veep.

episodes.name: Thursday, May 11, 2017
episodes.overview: Marcon's wife is his former classmate's hot mom & Trump says things he shouldn't have to Lester Holt. Cipha Sounds recalls the time Jay Z wouldn't give him his number.

episodes.name: Monday, May 15, 2017
episodes.overview: Kellyanne Conway might be as miserable in her job as we hope she is.  Al Sharpton recalls what he told Obama in '04 and what he told Trump in '17.

episodes.name: Tuesday, May 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump leaks all over some Russians again and his McMaster tries to clean up the mess. Cari Champion explains why thigh meat and journalism mesh.

episodes.name: Wednesday, May 17, 2017
episodes.overview: Putin & Comey both offer to share their notes on Trump's sketchy Oval Office conversations. Whoopi Goldberg discusses fame, the Knicks and her cannabis product for women.

episodes.name: Thursday, May 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump cries witch hunt, Ryan learns that tape recorders aren't loyal and there's a Japanese porn star who looks criminally young. Melissa Harris-Perry returns!

episodes.name: Monday, May 22, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump takes his talents to the Middle East for some sword dancing, orb grabbing, & First Lady irritating. NBA'er Enes Kanter explains why Turkey revoked his passport.

episodes.name: Tuesday, May 23, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero run with a twitter rumor that Melania wants out & marvel at a clip of two bees having sex. Hannibal Buress talks Baywatch and "vague fame."

episodes.name: Wednesday, May 24, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump meets the pope, Shaq & Barkley go at it and Ellen grills Nicki Minaj about Nas. Rob Huebel explains why he's banned from Yankee Stadium.

episodes.name: Thursday, May 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump finally gets to piss off NATO in person & former brain surgeon Ben Carson thinks poverty is a mindset. Larry Wilmore tells us which of his shows he's most proud of.

episodes.name: Monday, June 5, 2017
episodes.overview: Bill Maher drops the N word on his show and Megyn Kelly fails to get Putin to confess on hers. Malcolm Gladwell explains why you shouldn't want your kids to be geniuses.

episodes.name: Tuesday, June 6, 2017
episodes.overview: Eric & Donald Tump Jr. defend their dad, their business, and their sister. Joy Reid recalls the craziest story she ever covered as a reporter in Florida.

episodes.name: Wednesday, June 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump's intelligence team won't snitch to the Senate and Seinfeld won't give Ke$ha a hug. Sasheer Zamata lists all the other comics she gets confused for.

episodes.name: Thursday, June 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Comey calls Trump a liar under oath, McCain forgets which hearing he's at and more bee sex! Ron Funches breaks down his weed intake and his beef with LeBron.

episodes.name: Monday, June 12, 2017
episodes.overview: Melania moves to DC, Barkley goes to fat camp & there's finally a hair tattoo for bald people. Freddie Gibbs talks about being falsely accused and jailed in Austria.

episodes.name: Tuesday, June 13, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump's cabinet heaps staged praise on their leader, Durant gets his ring & Rodman goes back to North Korea to see his boo. Big Boi unblocks Desus on Twitter.

episodes.name: Wednesday, June 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Sessions testifies that he has a bad memory & that black women make him nervous. Lizzo talks about performing at Sam Bee's party for Hillary on election night.

episodes.name: Thursday, June 15, 2017
episodes.overview: For his birthday, Trump gets an investigation from the FBI and some serious clowning from the Australian PM. French Montana talks his new single and his bowling game.

episodes.name: Monday, June 19, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump's lawyer confirms & denies he's under investigation, Jay Z teases his new song & a man messes with the wrong pig. Baron Ambrosia recalls swimming the Bronx River.

episodes.name: Tuesday, June 20, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero bid a fond, "just in case" farewell to the Spiceman. Casanova 2X talks touring with Taxstone, sharing the stage with his daughter & meeting Jay Z.

episodes.name: Wednesday, June 21, 2017
episodes.overview: A pro golfer tries to end racism with some tweets & Reverend Al shows off his freakish strength. James Davis talks hanging with Kevin Hart and growing up Hood Adjacent.

episodes.name: Thursday, June 22, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump admits he didn't tape Comey & Phil Jackson admits he might ruin the Knicks. Matt Walsh talks living in the apocalypse & refrigerated dog food.

episodes.name: Monday, June 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Joe Budden's got no time for Migos & Trump's blaming Obama for his Russian drama. Bert Kreischer recalls the time Will Smith took him to the movies.

episodes.name: Tuesday, June 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Drake hosts the NBA Awards and LaVar Ball takes his act to the WWE. Janet Mock talks about her new book and hanging with Oprah.

episodes.name: Wednesday, June 28, 2017
episodes.overview: The Knicks are free at last from Phil, Melo reunites with Lala & Trump hits on a reporter in the Oval Office. Von Miller talks celebration dances & chicken farming.

episodes.name: Thursday, June 29, 2017
episodes.overview: Mika Brzezinski gets so deep under Trump's skin that he angrily tweets about hers. Diddy talks about his career and his new documentary "Cant' Stop Won't Stop."

episodes.name: Monday, July 17, 2017
episodes.overview: Conor McGregor makes a racial joke to prove he isn't racist. Eagles Safety Malcolm Jenkins discusses his criminal justice reform activism.

episodes.name: Tuesday, July 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Michael Vick offers terrible advice to Colin Kaepernick and Trumpcare dies on the table. Issa Rae talks season 2 of Insecure and #TeamIssa.

episodes.name: Wednesday, July 19, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump Jr. wants this nightmare to end as bad as we do. Action Bronson talks F*ck That's Delicious and his new album "Blue Chips 7000."

episodes.name: Thursday, July 20, 2017
episodes.overview: O.J. takes his talents to the parole board, Trump talks to the failing NY Times & a raccoon takes a hydrant bath in the BX. Matteo Lane talks Grindr & dating in Italy.

episodes.name: Monday, July 24, 2017
episodes.overview: "The Mooch" picks up the Spiceman's mic and Kushner kicks off his "no collusion" tour. A-Trak talks Fool's Gold and touring with Kanye.

episodes.name: Tuesday, July 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump takes some Boy Scouts to the swamp and Stephen A. spills more tea on Lebron & Kyrie. Spike Jonze talks Frank Ocean & the one prank they couldn't air on Jackass.

episodes.name: Wednesday, July 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump bans trans people from serving in the military he dodged. Vic Mensa talks about his 30-foot fall, tagging in Chicago and his new album "Autobiography."

episodes.name: Thursday, July 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Beiber has Jesus fever, The BBC gets a whiff of The Mooch & we got dancing grannies! Jessica Williams talks hanging with J.K. Rowling, Panda Express and her new show.

episodes.name: Monday, July 31, 2017
episodes.overview: Steph clowns Lebron, Mrs. Mooch files for divorce and Chris Christie confronts another angry sports fan. Irv Gotti talks "Tales", J-Lo and 50 Cent.

episodes.name: Tuesday, August 1, 2017
episodes.overview: Down goes The Mooch, Trump's got police brutality jokes and another demon goat video surfaces. DeRay McKesson talks RompHims, Kaepernick & mending fences with Whoopi.

episodes.name: Wednesday, August 2, 2017
episodes.overview: MJ gives LaVar Ball some fatherly advice and J-Lo & A-Rod take a joy ride. Liza Treyger talks shutting down hecklers and meeting Steve-O.

episodes.name: Thursday, August 3, 2017
episodes.overview: Stephen Miller brings his alt right charm to the WH press corps & Ray Lewis offers more confusing advice to Kaepernick. Jay Ellis talks nude scenes & Insecure's rise.

episodes.name: Monday, August 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump vacations in New Jersey, Putin fishes topless & Jon Jones chokes out Mero. James Van Der Beek talks playing Diplo and being the original meme.

episodes.name: Tuesday, August 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump's base shrinks & Boosie BadAzz posts a helluva birthday message to his young son. Yvonne Orji talks Insecure, meeting Obama & touring with Chris Rock.

episodes.name: Wednesday, August 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump sees Kim Jong Un's crazy & raises him "Fire and Fury", Manafort gets raided & Usher burns his accuser. DJ Clue talks DJing for The Mooch & meeting Michael Jackson

episodes.name: Thursday, August 10, 2017
episodes.overview: European leaders throw shade at Trump while God okays him nuking North Korea. Max Kellerman talks McGregor vs Mayweather & LeBron vs Jordan.

episodes.name: Monday, August 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Nazis send their worst and whitest to Virginia. Joe Mande talks his Netflix special, getting voicemails from Fabolous and tweeting dick pics to Mitch McConnell.

episodes.name: Tuesday, August 15, 2017
episodes.overview: A CNN panel erupts, a Confederate statue falls & Kim K. fails to get her fans to forgive Jeffree Star's racism. Seth Meyers talks Charlottesville, SNL & roasting Trump.

episodes.name: Wednesday, August 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump tries to convince America that not all Nazis are bad. Rep. Adriano Espaillat explains why he wanted to go to DC and gets introduced to "I no fucking baby."

episodes.name: Thursday, August 17, 2017
episodes.overview: A Nazi cries for help and a CA teacher fights to make Nazi punching legal. Angela Rye talks her new podcast, Omarosa & the CNN cafeteria.

episodes.name: Monday, August 21, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump stares down the eclipse & the NYPD raises "Blue Racism" awareness. Rachel Nichols explains why athletes shouldn't stick to sports.

episodes.name: Tuesday, August 22, 2017
episodes.overview: Tucker Carlson praises Trump for staring at the sun & a woman explains how you can get pregnant through the back door. Zane Lowe talks Kanye's impact on his career.

episodes.name: Wednesday, August 23, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump rambles to his base for 77 minutes at a rally in Phoenix. Russell Peters talks fighting bullies and almost getting to make out with Sofia Vergara.

episodes.name: Thursday, August 24, 2017
episodes.overview: James Clapper frets over Trump having nuke codes, a black man marches for the Confederacy & a dog uses a urinal. Esperanza Spalding recalls jamming with Prince.

episodes.name: Monday, August 28, 2017
episodes.overview: Mayweather KOs McGregor, Cardi B. wants Offset to propose & Trump appears to brag about his hurricane size. Rashad Jennings talks dancing, poetry and saving money.

episodes.name: Tuesday, August 29, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump visits Texas to offer its governor his support & an awkward handshake. The failing NY Times has new dirt on his ties to Russia. Bam Margera discusses his wild past.

episodes.name: Wednesday, August 30, 2017
episodes.overview: Joel Osteen responds to his twitter shamers and Trump admires the turnout for his hurricane rally. Aminé talks his new album, Portland and meeting Malia Obama.

episodes.name: Thursday, August 31, 2017
episodes.overview: Master P. has words for Kevin Hart, Jamie Foxx does a mean Stephen A. & Aaron Rodgers kinda has Kaepernick's back. Jermaine Fowler talks family & "Superior Donuts."

episodes.name: Monday, September 11, 2017
episodes.overview: Steve Bannon flexes his jowls on 60 minutes and Jim Carrey stops by Fashion Week to trash it. Danny McBride and Walton Goggins talk Vice Principals.

episodes.name: Tuesday, September 12, 2017
episodes.overview: Ted Cruz gets caught liking porn, Sergio Dipp takes bad sideline reporting to the next level & I No Fucking Baby lights up at a traffic stop. Jerry Ferrara talks "Power."

episodes.name: Wednesday, September 13, 2017
episodes.overview: Jemele Hill's Trump tweets upset racist Twitter and Jason Whitlock. Iman Shumpert recalls shooting Kanye's Fade video with his wife.

episodes.name: Thursday, September 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Schumer, Pelosi & Trump cut a DACA deal over Chinese food & Sarah Huckabee Sanders wants Jemele Hill fired. A$AP Twellvyy talks growing up in The BX

episodes.name: Monday, September 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Kevin Hart apologizes to prego wife for cheating. Kevin Durant uses fake twitter account to clap back at haters and Joy Bryant talks about being a Supermodel in the 90's.

episodes.name: Tuesday, September 19, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump threatens the "Rocket Man" at the UN. A mad pooper is on the loose in Colorado. Andra Day talks about her activism and being mentored by Stevie Wonder.

episodes.name: Wednesday, September 20, 2017
episodes.overview: Russia plays war games at NATO's doorstep. PETA runs up on Gucci Mane. A rhino can't get it up. Adrian Grenier talks about his #stopsucking campaign.

episodes.name: Thursday, September 21, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump meets African leaders and shouts out a country that doesn't exist. Jimmy Kimmel claps back at a Fox & Friend. Victor Oladipo talks about his music and his game.

episodes.name: Monday, September 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump inspires more NFL players to take a knee by calling them sons of bitches. Arian Foster discusses the NFL protests and their meaning.

episodes.name: Tuesday, September 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump finally shows his support for Puerto Rico by blaming it for the crisis. Jerry Jones takes a knee for the cameras. Bill Simmons talks all things NBA.

episodes.name: Wednesday, September 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Steven Seagal lectures NFL protesters on patriotism from Russia on a British talk show. Trump's Senate candidate eats it in Bama. Craig Robinson talks "Ghosted."

episodes.name: Thursday, September 28, 2017
episodes.overview: Ugandan Parliament members throw fists and chairs. American children try Jamaican food for the first time. G-Eazy talks his new album & coming up in Oakland.

episodes.name: Monday, October 2, 2017
episodes.overview: OJ gets stalked on his ride home from jail. Trump pretends to care about Puerto Rico. 21 Savage SlutWalks with Amber Rose. Terry Crews discusses his life & career.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 3, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump goes to Puerto Rico to offer high praise of his administration. Damian Lillard talks his new single, rookie pranks & "Cash me outside" girl.

episodes.name: Wednesday, October 4, 2017
episodes.overview: The Yankees take a step towards their 28th ring, bro. Trump tosses paper towels to Puerto Ricans. Jamilah Lemieux talks the "lone wolf" narrative & the Vegas shooting.

episodes.name: Thursday, October 5, 2017
episodes.overview: Cam Newton learns that there are female sports reporters. A McDonald's manager gets busted for selling the wrong kind of coke. Method Man talks Wu Tang and "The Deuce."

episodes.name: Monday, October 16, 2017
episodes.overview: Woody Allen feels sad for Harvey Weinstein. OJ's back out on the prowl. Black-ish creator Kenya Barris reveals which episode he's proudest of.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 17, 2017
episodes.overview: The Yankees clap back at the Astros. Trump and McConnell pretend to be pals. New Yorkers use literal doggy bags on the subway. A Boogie talks success at a young age.

episodes.name: Wednesday, October 18, 2017
episodes.overview: Dwyane Wade calls LeBron cheap and jealous of his hair. The Yankees come back to tie the series at 2. Michael Stahl-David talks Narcos, graffiti & his new films.

episodes.name: Thursday, October 19, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero enjoy game 5 with a white family at Yankee Stadium. A Yelper outs a restaurant for using Popeyes chicken. Charlamagne Tha God talks "Black Privilege."

episodes.name: Monday, October 23, 2017
episodes.overview: Lil B has love for A Boogie's crew after they jump him. Gabrielle Union preaches butt play reciprocity. J.B. Smoove talks "The Book of Leon" & the zombie apocalypse.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 24, 2017
episodes.overview: Bob Corker calls out Trump for all his lies. Ben Carson gets cooked by Rep. Al Green at a HUD budget hearing. Al Harrington talks his new Cannabis film & his NBA days.

episodes.name: Wednesdy, October 25, 2017
episodes.overview: Amazon wants the key to your house. A dude takes heat for the pics he's likin' on Instagram. Talib Kweli talks his new album & his relationships with Chappelle & Kanye.

episodes.name: Thursday, October 26, 2017
episodes.overview: Iman Shumpert drops in to watch clips and give some takes. Trump again reminds us how smart he is. Ty Dolla $ign talks about his new album “Beach House 3.”

episodes.name: Monday, October 30, 2017
episodes.overview: Paul Manafort gets indicted. Cardi B. gets a ring from Offset. Rosie Perez recalls meeting Spike Lee.

episodes.name: Tuesday, October 31, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump takes a break from fuming over Mueller to hand out candy to Halloweeners. DeRay Davis talks his Netflix special, roasting comics and polyamory.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 1, 2017
episodes.overview: J.LO and AROD share all their corny details with Vanity Fair. Conor McGregor drops the homophobic F-word again. Frankie J and Baby Bash perform “Suga Suga.”

episodes.name: Thursday, November 2, 2017
episodes.overview: The CIA shares Bin Laden's movie/porno playlist. Tyrese let's his feelings be known on Facebook, Papa John is mad at the NFL. Gabrielle Union discusses her new book.

episodes.name: Monday, November 6, 2017
episodes.overview: Diddy changes his name again. Shaq's beefin with "Big Shaq" from London. Fabolous talks his new collab with Jadakiss and relationship with Jay-Z.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Rand Paul gets jumped by his neighbor. A pastor shames a guy & his side chick at a service in Zimbabwe. Jeff Ross talks his new special & life as the roast king.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 8, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus makes Mero eat a McDonald's Filet-O-Fish sandwich. Two lions have sex 100 times in a day. Amanda Seales confronts Mero on his tweets @ her from 2012.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 9, 2017
episodes.overview: Drake is stockpiling Birkin bags for future Mrs. Drake. Trump gives China props for taking advantage of the U.S. Steve Stoute talks his success in music & advertising.

episodes.name: Monday, November 13, 2017
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero watch 50 shades of Sammy Sosa. Trump meets his favorite dictators in Asia. LeBron rides the subway. T. Pain talks his new album.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 14, 2017
episodes.overview: Enes Kanter gets in LeBron's face. A white guy thinks he's Filipino. A lady finds her man in bed with her mom. Jay Pharoah talks Charlie Murphy & “White Famous.”

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 15, 2017
episodes.overview: LaVar Ball's boy thanks Trump for freeing him from China. People thinks Blake Shelton is sexy. Gary Owen talks "All Def Comedy" & why black audiences like him.

episodes.name: Thursday, November 16, 2017
episodes.overview: A grandpa's heart gets broken on Wheel of Fortune. Articles of Trump's Impeachment get filed in Congress. Erykah Badu talks Soul Train Awards & being a doula.

episodes.name: Monday, November 20, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump earns beef status with LaVar Ball, Marshawn Lynch and Snoop Dogg all in one day. Sneaker Designer John Geiger talks shoes.

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 21, 2017
episodes.overview: Chris Cuomo tries to interview LaVar Ball. A rat terrorizes NYC subway riders. Marshawn Lynch loves Mexicans. Diplo talks Rihanna & his new doc.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 22, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump takes Roy Moore's word for it & claps back at LaVar Ball again. Ray Allen gets catfished. Daniel Caesar talks his new album.

episodes.name: The Ball Baggys
episodes.overview: Desus & Mero host the Ball Baggys: the first annual Thanksgiving awards show that celebrates clips of their favorite people, animals and moments from the past year.

episodes.name: Monday, November 27, 2017
episodes.overview: Prince Harry gets engaged. The failing NY Times profiles a Nazi. Cam'Ron and Ma$e have some beef on Thanksgiving. Black Thought talks The Roots & “The Deuce.”

episodes.name: Tuesday, November 28, 2017
episodes.overview: The Sex Robots are coming. Prince Harry & Meghan Markle discuss their engagement. Wyclef Jean talks his Haitian roots & his new mixtape.

episodes.name: Wednesday, November 29, 2017
episodes.overview: Jay-Z's Grammy nomination upsets Laura Ingraham. Eli Manning's benching upsets Mike Francesa. Matty Matheson talks his new show "IT'S SUPPERTIME!"

episodes.name: Thursday, November 30, 2017
episodes.overview: Jay-Z gets deep with the failing NY Times. Parliament roasts Trump for retweeting a British anti-Muslim group. Nikole Hannah-Jones talks why she got into journalism.

episodes.name: Monday, December 4, 2017
episodes.overview: Flynn's guilty plea induces an obstruction of justice worthy Trump tweet. Larry King can't handle a vape pen. Ester Dean talks songwriting & "Picture Perfect 3."

episodes.name: Wednesday, December 6, 2017
episodes.overview: LaVar Ball returns to CNN. Cops bust the most honest meth dealer in America. Wendy Williams throws shade at Ashanti. Big K.R.I.T. talks his new album and upcoming tour.

episodes.name: Thursday, December 7, 2017
episodes.overview: Trump slurs his speech on recognizing Jerusalem as the Israeli capital. A soccer fan apologizes for pooping in the stands. Pastor Carl Lentz recalls baptizing Bieber.

episodes.name: Tuesday, December 12, 2017
episodes.overview: The mom who filmed her bullied son swears she's not racist. An NYPD precinct releases a bad rap video. Seth Rogen recalls Kanye rapping for him in a van.

episodes.name: Tuesday, January 2, 2018
episodes.overview: CNN's New Year's Eve Live features a weed bus & a drunk Don Lemon. An MMA fighter can't find anyone to fight her. Hari Kondabolu talks "The Problem With Apu."

episodes.name: Wednesday, January 3, 2018
episodes.overview: Trump threatens nuclear war on twitter. DJ Khaled shares his Weight Watchers journey on Instagram. Justin Timberlake goes country. Katie Nolan talks life at ESPN.

episodes.name: Thursday, May 17, 2018
episodes.overview: A Russian face slap champion is crowned. A racist lawyer erupts at people speaking Spanish. A Kent State grad loves her guns. Terry Crews talks Brooklyn 99 & Deadpool 2.
